response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you today. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you for $950,000. This price reflects the significant investment required to obtain and maintain the product, as well as the exclusivity and prestige associated with owning such a valuable asset. I believe this offer presents a favorable balance between the value you see in the product and the cost of acquisition, ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. I am here to assist you throughout the process.", "product_price": 950000}
